body_html: I agree that TensorProto would be ideal for serialization, and spent some time on it. But became discouraged when I realized that the generated classes don't use primitive arrays. For many scenarios, Buffers provide the ideal performance and flexibility.
body_text: I agree that TensorProto would be ideal for serialization, and spent some time on it.  But became discouraged when I realized that the generated classes don't use primitive arrays. For many scenarios, Buffers provide the ideal performance and flexibility.
body: I agree that TensorProto would be ideal for serialization, and spent some time on it.  But became discouraged when I realized that the generated classes don't use primitive arrays. For many scenarios, Buffers provide the ideal performance and flexibility.
